title: Ronald Duncan (alpine skier)
text:
Ronald 'Boris' Duncan <a href="Chartered%20Physicist">CPhys</a> (born 4 September 1962) is a former <a href="Great%20Britain">British</a> <a href="Alpine%20skiing">alpine skier</a> who competed on the annual <a href="FIS%20Alpine%20Ski%20World%20Cup">FIS Alpine Ski World Cup</a> circuit from 1981-1993, at four <a href="FIS%20Alpine%20World%20Ski%20Championships">FIS Alpine World Ski Championships</a> and at the <a href="Great%20Britain%20at%20the%201988%20Winter%20Olympics">1988 Winter Olympics</a> in <a href="Calgary">Calgary</a> and the <a href="Great%20Britain%20at%20the%201992%20Winter%20Olympics">1992 Winter Olympics</a> in <a href="Albertville">Albertville</a>. He set up @UK PLC in 1999.
Sporting career.
In 1980 and 1983, Duncan was the British men's <a href="downhill%20%28ski%20competition%29">downhill</a> champion. He was also the men's <a href="Super-G">Super-G</a> champion in 1991 and men's combined champion in 1983 and 1991. 
Duncan's best finish on the world cup circuit was in the downhill on 15 March 1990, when he finished in 13th place at <a href="%C3%85re%20Ski%20Area">Are</a> in <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>.
At the <a href="1988%20Winter%20Olympics">1988 Winter Olympics</a>, Duncan finished 37th in the men's <a href="downhill%20%28ski%20competition%29">downhill</a> and '<a href="Did%20Not%20Finish">did not finish</a>' the men's <a href="Alpine%20skiing%20combined">combined</a>. In the <a href="1992%20Winter%20Olympics">1992 Winter Olympics</a> he finished 31st in the men's downhill, 40th in the men's <a href="Super-G">Super-G</a> and 'did not finish' the men's combined.
From 2002-04 Duncan was the chairman of the British Ski and Snowboard Federation, trading as Snowsport GB, the governing body for skiing and snowboarding in Great Britain.
Business career.
Duncan is the co-founder and chairman of @UK PLC. Previously, he ran a computer software consultancy. In 2014 and 2015 he was shortlisted for Entrepreneur of the Year, at the <a href="Grant%20Thornton">Grant Thornton</a> Quoted Company Awards.
